title: The High Harper
tags: how to unlock the high harper
content:
s. Geraldus, through his tears, sends you a signal indicating his fear. You can respond with:

[Detect Thoughts] Probe the halfling's mind. Geraldus, I'm sorry - please just speak plainly. Why is he so frightened of you? Ketheric was only the beginning. Do you possess information on the other Chosen? And you are...?
